orig_text:
[RFC4395]  Hansen, T., Hardie, T., and L. Masinter, "Guidelines and
            Registration Procedures for New URI Schemes", BCP 115, RFC
            4395, February 2006.
correct_text:
[RFC4395]  Hansen, T., Hardie, T., and L. Masinter, "Guidelines and
            Registration Procedures for New URI Schemes", BCP 35, RFC
            4395, February 2006.
notes: RFC 4395 is not BCP 115, but BCP 35

orig_text:
Text indicate
   info-URI        = info-scheme ":" info-identifier [ "#" fragment ]

In the practice is posible generate URI reference to relative path of web service. But in much case exists problem for resolv name and conflict in reverse name resolution. 
Good practice and compliance is use absolute path. Exists problem in journal and truncated information in URL relative. 
Example
thomas-signe.co
correct_text:
info-URI        = info-scheme ":" info-identifier [ "#" Absolute]

Absolute path to URI
notes: Good practice is use absolute path and reference correct in Root Domain and reverse lookup
